_sText:
Fixes:

Moved T-Spawn for balancing issues
Added Ladders to get out of water
Improved Performance
Improved Clipping
Improved Lighting
Improved Skybox (Though unable to fix completely, due to optimization issues)

I have left the damage on entering the water, some people complained about this but it is there as a deterrent, and to make sure people stick to the boardwalks.  I still recommend playing this in a round-based gun-game/fight-yard mode as it is asymmetrical, and probably isn't completely balanced, however more so than the original.

Please inform me of any bugs, problems or improvements, I'm sure there are a few.

Thanks
